name: Kobold Style
text: You’re able to manipulate foes that are caught off guard.
prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Small size or smaller.
benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on combat maneuver checks against enemies denied their Dexterity bonus to AC.
text_zh: 你可以控制措手不及的敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 寓守于攻，小体型或更小。
benefit_zh: 你对AC上失去敏捷加值的敌人的战技检定获得+4加值。
